EmailTemplate.name: CCL1_BoosterShot.Email_OpsMgrCTA
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.first name:default=VMTurbo}}: Try Virtualization Management from the Future
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.first name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Over 500 forward-thinking organizations trust VMTurbo with their virtual datacenters. They can't all be wrong: (http://bit.ly/1cqmTk6)
VMTurbo Operations Manager 4.5 is the only virtualization manager that assures application performance while utilizing the underlying infrastructure as efficiently as possible. Check out how we do it: (http://bit.ly/1gFs5Di).
VMTurbo automates Intelligent Workload Management, preventing resource contention problems before they occur, and driving CAPEX and OPEX to rock bottom: (http://bit.ly/1eBaTMC).
Our free 30-day trial (http://bit.ly/OH88EC) deploys on any hypervisor within 30 minutes, makes its first recommendations within 1 hour, and drives your environment to optimal health within 1 week, guaranteed.
It's a new era in virtual ops management. Own your environment.
In good health, VMTurbo
